name: Sierra Club
desc: The most enduring and influential grassroots environmental organization in the United States.

name: American Red Cross
desc: Provides emergency assistance, disaster relief, and disaster preparedness education in the United States and around the world.

name: The Nature Conservancy
desc: A global environmental nonprofit working to create a world where people and nature can thrive by conserving the lands and waters.

name: St. Jude Children's Research Hospital
desc: Leading the way the world understands, treats, and defeats childhood cancer and other life-threatening diseases.

name: Charity: Water
